alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Franklin and southeastern St. Lawrence Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Star Lake to 7 miles northwest of Brown Tract Pond Campground. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oswegatchie, Piercefield, Cranberry Lake, Star Lake, Horseshoe Lake, Lower Oswegatchie, Gale, Conifer, Newton Falls, Childwold, Shurtleff and Wanakena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
